      • doSTAFInstall

        static int doSTAFInstall()
        Perform STAF install. If -silent parameter was specified then a silent install will be done.
        Currently all installs are silent.
        If -staf parameter was specified then the install will attempt to use any provided user-specified directory for the install.

      • doSTAFUnInstall

        static int doSTAFUnInstall()
        Perform uninstall STAF. Uninstall STAF silently.

      • install

        public boolean install(java.lang.String... args)
        Currently assumes SeleniumPlus has been installed (unzipped) and SELENIUM_PLUS is already set. Can set SELENIUM_PLUS if args[0] is given a valid value to use. If args[0] is provided, the path will be validated before it is used. Adds SeleniumPlus paths to CLASSPATH and PATH Environment Variables as long as SeleniumPlus JAR is found to exist.
        Specified by:
        install in interface InstallerInterface

      • uninstall

        public boolean uninstall(java.lang.String... args)
        Unset the System Environment Variables used by SeleniumPlus. Remove SELENIUM_PLUS and paths from CLASSPATH and PATH Environment Variables. Can unset SELENIUM_PLUS if args[0] is given a value to use.
        Specified by:
        uninstall in interface InstallerInterface
        Parameters:
        args -
        Returns:

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This Installer provides no GUI, but will accept some configuration parameters. Any user-specified directories must exist; or, we must not be denied the ability to create them and write/copy files to them.

        Parameters:
        args[] - The following parameters or arguments can be specified:
        • <SeleniumPlusPath>
          the root directory where SeleniumPlus resides.
          This is usually the directory where the Setup script resides.

        • -u
          perform an uninstall instead of install.

        • -np
          If the -np option is not provided, then the installer will propogate and execute other necessary Installers.

        • -nostaf
          Skip the installation of STAF.

        • -staf "alternate STAF directory"
          Install STAF files and services to the user specified directory instead of the default install directory.
          The -staf argument does not have to be specified to install to the default directory (root\STAF).

        • -removestaf installedstafdir
          Remove the installed STAF. installedstafdir indicates the directory where staf is installed, like "C:\STAF\" or "/usr/local/staf"

        • -installstafexe alternateSTAFexecutable
          Indicate an alternate (newer) STAF installation executable to use.
          This will override the STAF 3 or later default executable.

        Main Java executable. Primarily to run standalone outside of a larger process.

        %SELENIUMPLUSDIR%\Java\jre\bin\java org.safs.install.SeleniumPlusInstaller [C:\SeleniumPlus]

        %SELENIUMPLUSDIR%\Java\jre\bin\java org.safs.install.SeleniumPlusInstaller -u [C:\SeleniumPlus]

        If the -np option is not provided, then the installer will propogate and execute other necessary SAFS Framework Installers.

        System.exit(0) on perceived success.
        System.exit(-1) on perceived failure.

        args: -

          "-u" -- to perform an uninstall instead of install.
          "-np" -- do not propogate to other installers.
          Any first arg other than (-u or -np) will be considered the path for SELENIUMPLUSDIR.
          The path for SELENIUMPLUSDIR does NOT need to be provided if the System Environment Variable already exists with a valid setting.
        See Also:
        SilentInstaller, propogate
